G

gapToClosestExecution(Cron, ZonedDateTime) - Static method in class com.github.emmanueltouzery.CronExecution
Calculates the gap between the date you give and the closest execution date for the cron specification you supply (either before or after the date you give).

I

isMatch(ZonedDateTime) - Method in class com.github.emmanueltouzery.Cron
